name: Tsuki Adventure: Idle Journey
description:
Travel to the countryside and enjoy a relaxing game in Tsuki Adventure. Harvest carrots from the farm, meet new animal friends and enjoy a simple life with Tsuki.

Tsuki was lonely. A stressful job. A thankless boss. A busy, chaotic life in a noisy city. But one day, with the arrival of a plain letter, everything changed for Tsuki.

Tsuki inherited the family carrot farm in rustic Mushroom Village. Now, here in the countryside, away from all the noise and stress of city life, Tsuki quickly comes to appreciate the simple things.

Enjoy a relaxing, story-based game filled with cute animals. You can check in on Tsuki throughout the day, collect new items and visit locations around the country, while finding hidden surprises.

Whether it's fishing with Yori the fox, reading books with Chi the giraffe, or sampling the delicious ramen made by Bobo the panda... every moment is precious.

Join Tsuki in an awe-inspiring adventure and discover all the beauty that country life has to offer.

Tsuki Adventure Features:

Animal Story Game
- Tsuki’s new life in the countryside is filled with new animal friends
- Enjoy a story-driven tale
- Explore the Mushroom Village
- Unlock new, adorable diary entries

Relaxing, Passive Game
- Check in on Tsuki and see how things are doing
- Buy and collect items for Tsuki to use
- Visit Tsuki any time and watch the story unfold

Country Game
- Grow carrots at the family farm
- Go fishing, clean up the village & more for nifty upgrades
- Get to know Tsuki’s neighbors

Collect Items
- Buy new items from Yori the fox
- Collect toys from the gachapon machine with gacha tickets
- Decorate Tsuki’s house with your personal touch

Hidden Surprises
- Find new mini-games to enjoy
- Enjoy special events
- Explore and find new activities

Meet Tsuki and the animals of Mushroom Village, gather carrots and enjoy the peace of country life in Tsuki Adventure.
